1.0.name: wordpress/spotify-embed-creator
1.0.description: Search for Album or Track on Spotify and create a Spotify Play Button by iFrame or Shortcode. Shows up both as a separate admin view as well as on the "edit post" page as a meta box for direct inserting into the content area.
